message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'd be happy to buy it for $140.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $175 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $160. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $140. It's the best I can do at this time.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your offer of $140, but I'm still hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to compromise further and sell it to you for $155. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
